In England, in the seven days to 20 March, there were 476,789 new confirmed cases (843.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 March, there were 374,036 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 27% (102,753 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 March is 17,419,944 (30,804.4 cases per 100,000 population).
